import axios from"axios";const serverUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL;const api=axios.create({baseURL:serverUrl,withCredentials:true,timeout:50000000});// ðŸŸ¢ Interceptor request
api.interceptors.request.use(async config=>{return config;},error=>Promise.reject(error));api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,async error=>{if(error.response){throw new Error(error.response.data.message||"Error.");}else if(error.request){throw new Error("Connection Error.");}else{throw new Error("System Error");}});export default api;
